dcterms:description: A dataset containing about 240,000 dialogue triples, suitable for studying the relevance-diversity tradeoff in multi-turn conversations.
dcterms:title: Movie Triples Dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Lowe
N. Pow

dcterms:description: A dataset containing about 1.85 million conversations, ideal for training dialogue models that provide expert knowledge/recommendation in domain-specific conversations.
dcterms:title: Ubuntu Dialogue Dataset
